name: Oneiric Horror, Greater
savingThrow: Will negates, Fortitude negates, see text
text: This spell functions as oneiric horror except each round the subject fails its Will save, it takes 1 point of Strength damage, and after the spell ends, the subject must succeed at a Fortitude save or be fatigued for a number of minutes equal to the number of rounds spent under the spell’s effect.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效; 强韧, 通过则无效; 见文本
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同恐惧梦魇（Oneiric Horror）一般，不过每轮当受术者的意志豁免失败时，它会受到1点力量伤害，而且在法术结束后，受术者必须进行一次强韧豁免，失败则会在等同于法术效果生效轮数的分钟数内陷入疲乏（fatigued）。
